text:
(ENCHANTER) The faltyn  takes the item Larisha has just given to you. Having secured what it asked for, the faltyn flits invisibly into the fountain. A moment later it hovers at your side once more. "The other items are beyond my reach," it whispers, "but I tried to obtain them and that was what we agreed. I now depart."

"Wait!" you snarl. "Impudent imp! Malicious sprite!" But it is too late. The faltyn has vanished, taking with it Larisha's gift.
